channel.title: ISAT Script RSS Feed
channel.description: Keep up to date with the In Stars And Time Script Project!

item.title: Miraquest
item.description: Mirabelle's Friendquest, including all variations and actions leading up to it.

item.title: Mirabelle's Dorm Room
item.description: All text for Mirabelle's dorm room on floor 3.

item.title: Mirabelle Beginning Talk
item.description: Dialogue with Mirabelle in Dormont, both from entering town and talking to her on the bench.

item.title: Game files to wiki Portrait names
item.description: Since the game files and the portraits on the wiki are differently named, here's a conversion list for all of them, just in case.

item.title: Confession and Bad Touch
item.description: Everything relating to Isabeau's disastrous love life. Includes both the confession attempts in the final room, as well as the shoulder touches and associated event at the Favor Tree.

item.title: Isabeau End Talk
item.description: Dialogue for Isabeau inside the final room. Includes the "confession".

item.title: ACT 3 Intro
item.description: A small compilation of the ACT 3 Intro, including scenes in the meadow, talking to Mirabelle, and meeting up with Loop.

item.title: Meadow
item.description: All text associated with the meadow, including all ACT intros and nap taking.

item.title: Odilequest
item.description: Everything about Odile's Friendquest. Includes all preparations for it, like scouring libraries, talking to the Boulanger, arguing with children, and everything Loop has to say on the subject. And the main scene itself, of course.

item.title: About page
item.description: In order to cut down on sidebar space on every page, I now have an About page to be verbose about site formatting practicies.

item.title: Testing, testing!
item.description: Hello hello? Does this thing work?
